Requirement: The system should provide customizable themes and color schemes to allow users to personalize the interface according to their preferences
The system should provide tools for monitoring and analyzing user performance
The system should have a user-friendly and intuitive interface for configuring device settings and viewing data
The system should provide logs and alerts for system events and errors
The system should have a clear and user-friendly interface for managing connected devices and networks
The system should provide support for users with disabilities
